captions.text:
>>THANKS SO MUCH!
I REALLY HOPE MY GIRLFRIEND LIKES THESE.

>>SHE IS GOING TO FEEL SO SPECIAL.
TRUST ME.

>>THANK YOU.
>>YEP! BU-BYE!
>>UH HEY GUYS. HI.
SO TODAY I AM IN NEED OF A FLOWER.

>>OH!
WELL YOU'VE COME TO THE RIGHT PLACE!

>>OH GOOD.
>>YOU LOOK VERY DAPPER.

>>DAPPER?
I'M SUPPOSED TO LOOK SUPER HOT.

>>OH!
WHAT'S THE OCCASION?

>>I'M GOING ON A ROMANTIC DATE.
>>OH!

GREAT!
SO DO YOU KNOW WHAT YOU WANT?

>>A WARM EMBRACE.
>>EXCUSE ME?

>>MAYBE A KISS IN THE MOONLIGHT.
>>OH, RIGHT!

WITH YOUR DATE.
I MEANT WHAT KIND OF FLOWER DO YOU WANT?

>>I'M NOT FAMILIAR WITH FLOWERS.
I SELL BISQUE.

>>OH!
SO YOU'RE A COOK.

>>MUSHROOM BISQUE.
EGGPLANT BISQUE.

DOCTOR PEPPER BISQUE.
>>NICE. UH- >>LOBSTER BISQUE.

YOU SHOULD TRY IT.
WORLD FAMOUS LOBSTER BISQUE.

>>I WILL HAVE TO DO THAT.
>>YEAH.

>>WHY DON'T WE HELP YOU FIND A FLOWER?
>>AH YES.

SO I NEED SOMETHING THAT SAYS "HEY BABY.
"WHO IS YOUR DREAMBOAT?"

"OH WAIT.
"I FOUND HIM.

IT'S ME."
DO YOU GUYS HAVE THAT ONE?

>>UH, WELL, YOU COULD TRY THESE
LOVELY DAFFODILS OR UM- OR HOW ABOUT A SUNFLOWER?

THESE ARE BEAUTIFUL.
>>WELL, I'M SORRY BUT MY GIRLFRIEND CAN'T

SEE THEM.
SHE HAS A BLIND DATE.

>>SO YOU'VE NEVER MET HER?
>>HOW DID YOU KNOW THAT?

ARE YOU A SIDEKICK?
>>NO.

>>DO YOU ALSO READ PALMS?
>>WHAT?

>>BECAUSE MY LIFELINE GOES ALL THE WAY DOWN
TO MY ELBOW.
I THINK I AM IMMORTAL.
>>UH, THAT'S NICE.

>>YES.
>>WHY NOT TRY A ROMANTIC RED ROSE?

>>WOULD MY GIRLFRIEND LIKE THIS ONE?
>>OH VERONICA?

>>HER NAME IS NOT VERONICA.
>>NO, THAT'S THE FLOWER'S NAME.

>>YOU NAME YOUR FLOWERS?
THAT IS NOT GOOD.

YOU WILL GET EMOTIONALLY ATTACHED.
>>NO, THAT'S NOT WH- >>NO TRUST ME.

ONE TIME I NAMED MY BISQUE BILBO 
AND THEN WHEN I
SOLD IT TO A CUSTOMER I GOT THE POST-PARTUM'S.
>>NO, VERONICA IS THE KIND OF FLOWER.

SEE, THIS IS A ROSE, THIS IS VERONICA,
AND THIS IS A LILY.

>>OH YOU NAMED THEM ALL AFTER GIRLS.
VERY INTERESTING.

>>AND THAT'S RANUNCULUS.
>>YOU'RE RANUNCULUS!

>>NO!
THAT'S THE NAME OF THE FLOWER!

>>GET SOME HELP SISTER.
>>NEVER MIND.

IS THAT THE FLOWER YOU WANT?
>>NO.

>>OH.
>>NONE OF THESE FLOWERS SMELL GOOD.

DO YOU HAVE ANY THAT TASTE GOOD?
>>TASTE?

YOU'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO EAT THEM!
>>SHE MIGHT.

IF SHE'S HUNGRY ENOUGH.
>>THE ONLY FLOWER I CAN EVEN THINK OF THAT
PEOPLE USE IN FOOD HIBISCUS.

>>HIBISCUS?
>>YEAH.

THEY USE IT IN HERBAL TEA.
>>HIBISCUS TEA?

YOU HAVE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME?
WHAT- WHERE IS IT?

WHAT IS THIS?
>>THIS IS WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE.

>>FIVE PETALS.
FIVE DELICIOUS BITES.

FIVE CHILDREN- >>I HAVE AN IDEA.
WHY DON'T YOU TAKE THIS AND YOU KNOW MAYBE,

THIS AND THIS, AND UH-
YOU KNOW A LITTLE BIT OF THIS.

>>WHAT IS THIS A STINKING BOUQUET?
>>YES.

>>OH YEAH, IT IS.
IT'S NICE.

BUT HOW ELSE CAN I EAT IT?
>>SERIOUSLY?

>>HIBISCUS ICE CREAM?
HIBISCUS SODA?

HIBISCUS LASAGNA?
>>LISTEN.

BUY THE BOUQUET.
YOU COULD MAKE HER SO HAPPY.

MAYBE EVEN FALL IN LOVE WITH YOU.
>>OH THAT'S NICE.

>>MAYBE.
>>YEAH.

I LIKE IT.
>>OR YOU COULD BUY THE HIBISCUS AND MAKE SOME

WEIRD FOOD.
>>OH, CONUNDRUM.
>>HONESTLY, WHICH IS BETTER?
>>HIBISCUS BISQUE!
